resources.string: "You won't be able to keep using our services unless you agree to the new version of the Privacy Policy. Agree to the updated Privacy Policy now?"
Grant mandatory permissions to be able to use this feature
People who purchase this model can enjoy the following benefits
"Can't make an appointment for this time"
"Get the first screen replacement for half the price"

"Note: 1. Back up all your data before sending your device. Include all items you got during the purchase in the package. Our engineers will check your device and confirm what needs to be done. 2. You don't have to pay the delivery. 3. Half-price screen replacement doesn't cover the replacement fee. 4. Call 400-100-5678 if you have any questions regarding the services we provide."
"手指滑动屏幕，使色块全部变色 按电源键可以停止检测"
按电源键可以停止检测
"请连接充电器，检测过程会持续3-5秒， 检测到充电状态后将自动通过"
检测到设备处于充电状态
请确认屏幕显示是否存在问题
请点击屏幕切换颜色，并确认是否存在坏点
请确认屏幕中是否存在坏点，点击屏幕可切换颜色
请按压指纹传感器，检测成功后将自动通过
指纹检测需要您在设置中开启指纹解锁功能，请前往设置录入指纹
指纹传感器一般位于屏幕中下部、手机侧边电源键或手机背面
"麦克风正在收音，请发出声音， 音量达标后将自动通过"
点击“开始检测”后，请对麦克风发出声音
检测到麦克风收音正常
请把卡片放在手机背面，读取到卡片后将自动通过
请授予位置访问权限，以便此应用程序可以在后台定位。
当前应用需要申请后台定位权限
蓝牙和WLAN检测需要获取位置信息，请开启位置服务
WLAN检测需要打开WLAN功能，请开启WLAN
"正在播放音频，请将手机贴近耳朵， 并确认是否听到音频"
点击“开始检测”后，听筒将播放一段音频
请确认是否感受到手机振动
"正在播放音频，请靠近手机扬声器， 并确认是否听到音频"
点击“开始检测”后，扬声器将播放一段音频
To check IMEI, dial *#06# on a phone or visit Settings > About device > All specs > Status > IMEI.
"Free home service in 100 cities Free delivery Backup devices"

"Note: 1. Back up all your data before sending your device. Include all items you got during the purchase in the package. Our engineers will check your device and confirm what needs to be done. 2. You don't have to pay the delivery fee when you send your device to be repaired. 3. Call 400-100-5678 if you have any questions regarding the services we provide."
IMEI has been copied to the clipboard
The info you provided is incomplete

"If you continue, you'll cancel our services. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. Your order history will no longer be available to you. Cancel services anyway?"
Pass token expired. Sign in again.
Describe the issue (mandatory when \"Other\" is selected)
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year

"We don't provide at-home services in the area you selected. You can select another location or send your device to us. Call <Data><font color=blue>400-100-5678</font></Data> if you have any questions regarding the services we provide."
没有网络，请检查网络连接
No service locations in this city yet
点击“开始检测”后，观察取景框内是否有图像
请点击开始并滑动手指来检测屏幕
Read and agree to the new version of the Privacy Policy before you continue.
"You'll receive an appointment cofirmation text message."
"In-store cleaning, maintenance, software and hardware adjustments"
"Note: 1. Call 400-100-5678 if you have any questions regarding the services we provide. 2. You can use your appointment confirmation SMS to skip the line in the store."
You can save up to 20 addresses
"快速检测手机问题 时刻掌握手机健康状态"
You can use this feature to talk to customer support, repair your device, make in-store appointments, arrange screen replacements and maintenance services.

Customer support, repairs, in-store appointments, screen replacement, and maintenance services
用于自助检测功能中的麦克风检测
用于自助检测功能中的摄像头检测
读写设备上的照片及文件
For providing services based on your device IMEI

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of \"My services\". The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As \"My services\" provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept these services. Withdraw consent now?"
